content.question: Which of the following scenarios involves using cued recall?

choices.label: Letitia uses a mnemonic device to help her remember the names of all the lobes of the brain.
Steven studies a list of word pairs and is later given the first word of each pair and asked to recall the second word in the pair.
To help her remember what she needs from the grocery store, Marjorie imagines walking through her kitchen and visualizing what is missing.
Kumail scores well on a multiple-choice quiz because he recognizes all of the correct answers when he sees them.

content.answer: Steven studies a list of word pairs and is later given the first word of each pair and asked to recall the second word in the pair.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
